alert.note: Alert for Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rockdale, central DeKalb, southeastern Cobb, south central Gwinnett and central Fulton Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Austell to Little Five Points to near Snellville, and moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, Snellville, Clarkston, Stone Mountain, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, North Druid Hills, Midtown, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, Tucker, Mountain Park and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Cobb; DeKalb; Gwinnett; North Fulton; Rockdale
